title: Direction of Quadratic
text: A quadratic equation for a parabola that opens up has a minimum, while a quadratic that opens down has a maximum value.

title: Coefficient of $$x^2$$
text: To determine if a parabola opens upwards or downwards, check the coefficient of the $$x^2$$ term.

title: Sign of the Coefficient of $$x^2$$
text: Regardless of the value, if the coefficient of $$x^2$$ is positive, the parabola opens upwards. If the coefficient is negative, the parabola opens downwards.
